{{Location Intro|description=It is a hidden isle located south of the coast of [[Coatepec Mountain]]. Initially it is hidden from the [[Map]] but it will be shown after completing all four [[Time Trial Challenge]]s located on the island.}} Additionally the island features a specific weather, perpetually overcast and slightly misty, which will be lifted upon completion of the challenges.

The first three time trial challenges are immediately accessible and can be completed in any order, while the fourth time trial challenge will only appear at the center of the island after completing the first three. Notably these four challenges are unique, as none of them actually feature a countdown timer component.

Unlocking the [[Teleport Waypoint]] on the island grants the {{Achievement|Only the Training Grounds Are Left?}}
